代码总览

代码总览

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('Account')
and type = 'U')
drop table Account
go

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('UserDetail')
and type = 'U')
drop table UserDetail
go

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('Friend')
and type = 'U')
drop table Friend
go

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('Message')
and type = 'U')
drop table Message
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Account */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Account (
id int not null,
uid nvarchar(18) not null,
username nvarchar(20) not null,
userNum int not null,
password nvarchar(20) not null,
portrait text not null,
state nvarchar(2) not null,
onlineTimes float not null,
info text null,
constraint PK_ACCOUNT primary key (id)
)
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: UserDetail */
/*==============================================================*/
create table UserDetail (
number nvarchar(18) not null,
name nvarchar(10) not null,
sex nvarchar(1) null,
age int null,
birthday datetime null,
constellation nvarchar(3) null,
bloodgroup nvarchar(3) null,
constraint PK_USERDETAIL primary key (number)
)
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Friend */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Friend (
id int not null,
uid int not null,
fid int null,
constraint PK_FRIEND primary key (id)
)
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Message */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Message (
id int not null,
type nvarchar(4) not null,
source int not null,
target int not null,
time datetime not null,
constraint PK_MESSAGE primary key (id)
)
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Friend */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Friend (
id int not null,
uid int not null,
fid int null,
constraint PK_FRIEND primary key (id)
)
go

帐号表的代码预览

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('Account')
and type = 'U')
drop table Account
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Account */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Account (
id int not null,
uid nvarchar(18) not null,
username nvarchar(20) not null,
userNum int not null,
password nvarchar(20) not null,
portrait text not null,
state nvarchar(2) not null,
onlineTimes float not null,
info text null,
constraint PK_ACCOUNT primary key (id)
)
go


帐号表的列清单

id

uid

QQ名

username

userNum

密码

password

portrait

状态

state

from sysobjects

and type = 'U')

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: Message */
/*==============================================================*/
create table Message (
id int not null,
type nvarchar(4) not null,
source int not null,
target int not null,
time datetime not null,
constraint PK_MESSAGE primary key (id)
)
go

用户表的代码预览

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('UserDetail')
and type = 'U')
drop table UserDetail
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: UserDetail */
/*==============================================================*/
create table UserDetail (
number nvarchar(18) not null,
name nvarchar(10) not null,
sex nvarchar(1) null,
age int null,
birthday datetime null,
constellation nvarchar(3) null,
bloodgroup nvarchar(3) null,
constraint PK_USERDETAIL primary key (number)
)
go


用户表的列清单

名称

代码

number

真实姓名

name

性别

sex

年龄

age

生日

birthday

constellation
